text: Charlie Wyse (born Sep 12 1946) is an educator and former Canadian politician, who was a New Democratic Member of the Legislative Assembly in British Columbia from 2005 to 2009. He represented the riding of Cariboo South. Wyse, a teacher until 2004, served 23 years as a member of the city council for Williams Lake. He ran in the newly created riding of Cariboo-Chilcotin for the 2009 election. He was initially declared the winner on election night, but was subsequently declared defeated by BC Liberal challenger Donna Barnett after a recount. ==References== Category:British Columbia New Democratic Party MLAs Category:Living people Category:1940s births Category:21st-century Canadian politicians
title: Charlie Wyse
